label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_010
content:
## 2024-05-06 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 96
- Active: 92
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 24
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 31
- Standard: 32
- Placebo: 33

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.4
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 38.7
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 11.2
- Multimodal Six MWT Meters Mean: 324.0
- Multimodal Six MWT Meters SD: 57.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength kg Mean: 25.6
- Multimodal Grip Strength kg SD: 3.5
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 3.8
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.8

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.9
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Standard Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 46.3
- Standard Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 8.0
- Standard Six MWT Meters Mean: 285.0
- Standard Six MWT Meters SD: 39.0
- Standard Grip Strength kg Mean: 20.6
- Standard Grip Strength kg SD: 5.5
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.6

- Placebo Grip Strength kg SD: 4.9
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.0
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.3

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 182
- Sessions Attended: 174
- Attendance Rate %: 82.2

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin g/dL Mean: 13.0
- Hemoglobin g/dL SD: 1.4
- WBC k Mean: 7.1
- WBC k SD: 1.2
- Platelets k Mean: 257
- Platelets k SD: 49

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1041, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1086, Description: insomnia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1024, Description: muscle spasm, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1047, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1022, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1040, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: PM-PD-1016, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Central pharmacy opioid supply reconciliation completed
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 83%
- Central pharmacy opioid supply reconciliation completed

### Notes
- Week 10: Pain management assessments on track. 96 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
